# nexus-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                                            | Type      | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `bgColor`   | `bg-color`  | Background color of the card                                                                           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `bgImage`   | `bg-image`  | Background image path of the card                                                                      | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `clickable` | `clickable` | If set to `true` the entire card will be clickable based on the anchor tag found inside the component. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `height`    | `height`    | The height to the card                                                                                 | `string`  | `undefined` |
